title: Furman’s Gloss on Say’s Law
sub_head: ‘Returning workers increase supply, but they increase demand as well through the spending power of their income.’
body:
In “Bad News About the Good Inflation News” (op-ed, March 7), Jason Furman writes, “Returning workers increase supply, but they increase demand as well through the spending power of their income.” That is one of the best summaries of Say’s Law of Markets that I have ever seen. Has Mr. Furman become a supply-sider?
Kevin Swift
